discourse_list.title: Delegates Web Page: Make the toggle default to 'On' for "See how other token holders delegated"

content.content: Hi Admins and Optimists, On the page, https://app.optimism.io/delegates, there is a toggle button that allows to view the current OP delegated to Delegates. The “See how other token holders delegated” Toggle Button. I don’t think I’m the only doofus who didn’t immediately see this toggle button when trawling the website and this page. Thus, in the spirit of decentralising delegate voting power: Can we make this toggle button default to being switched ‘On’? Or just remove the toggle button and make the OP delegations for each delegate permanently viewable as a feature? Hope this can be done. Seems easy enough to do(?). Thanks for your time!
